segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 provide Windows PowerShell cmdlets, which can help administrators perform various UE-V tasks.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 provide Windows PowerShell cmdlets, which can help administrators perform various UE-V tasks.

segment.source: The following sections provide more information about using Windows PowerShell in UE-V.
segment.target: The following sections provide more information about using Windows PowerShell in UE-V.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Administering UE-V 2 with Windows PowerShell requires Windows PowerShell 3.0 or higher.
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2 with Windows PowerShell requires Windows PowerShell 3.0 or higher.

segment.source: For a complete list of UE-V PowerShell cmdlets, see UE-V 2 Cmdlet Reference.
segment.target: For a complete list of UE-V PowerShell cmdlets, see UE-V 2 Cmdlet Reference.

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and packages by using Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and packages by using Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: You can use Windows PowerShell and Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to manage UE-V Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.
segment.target: You can use Windows PowerShell and Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to manage UE-V Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.

segment.source: The following topic describes how to manage configuration and synchronization.
segment.target: The following topic describes how to manage configuration and synchronization.

segment.source: The following topic describes how to manage configuration and synchronization.
segment.target: The following topic describes how to manage configuration and synchronization.

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing UE-V 2.x settings location templates by using Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing UE-V 2.x settings location templates by using Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: After you create and deploy UE-V settings location templates, you can manage those templates by using Windows PowerShell or WMI.
segment.target: After you create and deploy UE-V settings location templates, you can manage those templates by using Windows PowerShell or WMI.

segment.source: The following topic describes how to manage the settings location templates by using Windows PowerShell and WMI.
segment.target: The following topic describes how to manage the settings location templates by using Windows PowerShell and WMI.

segment.source: Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI
